name: Kleebuu craves Fruit Salad (itch)
description:
Eat fruit, jump around and escape the nightmares!

🎮Controls                                                                   

WSD/ARROWS/SPACE to move                    

E to "woof"    

ESCAPE to pause and for settings      

There's also controller support! 

⏱️Play Time 20-35 minutes

🐕Features "woof" button with 4 different honks!

                       

💡Did You Know? Kleebuu craves Fruit Salad.

⭐All music, sfx, art and code are by me but I would like to give a special thanks to Pursuing Pixels for their continued love and support on my progress posts for all my projects.  Also thanks to DENMarkus and  sourencho for playtesting!                     

🎵This game is pay what you want meaning you can play the game for free! If you would like to support the game you can pay $3 and get the OST as a download.
